What I've done

as a designer with a programming background, I became a front-end developer and have developed interests in ux/ui design, web development and visual analytics. For the past few years, I've worked on numerous web applications mainly as a ux/ui designer and front-end developer.

my academic career has also shaped my interest in research-focused projects mostly in the scope of visual analytics and personal informatics.

below are some of my favourite projects that I've worked on.
